mapper.select: select spa.id, spa.name, spa.code, spa.description, spa.group_id "groupId", spa.sort, spa.status, spa.create_by "createBy", spa.update_by "updateBy", spa.create_time "createTime", spa.update_time "updateTime", spa.deleted from tr_user_role tur left join tr_permission_role_menu tprm on tur.role_id = tprm.role_id left join tr_permission_menu_action tpma on tprm.menu_id = tpma.menu_id left join sys_permission_action spa on spa.id = tpma.action_id where spa.deleted = 0 and spa.status = 1

select spa.id, spa.name, spa.code, spa.description, spa.group_id "groupId", spa.sort, spa.status, spa.create_by "createBy", spa.update_by "updateBy", spa.create_time "createTime", spa.update_time "updateTime", spa.deleted from tr_user_role tur left join tr_permission_role_menu tprm on tur.role_id = tprm.role_id left join tr_permission_menu_action tpma on tprm.menu_id = tpma.menu_id left join sys_permission_action spa on spa.id = tpma.action_id where tur.user_id = #{userId} and spa.deleted = 0 and spa.status = 1

select spm.id, spm.name, spm.code,spm.type, spm.description, spm.parent_id "parentId", spm.url, spm.path, spm.method, spm.icon, spm.style, spm.sort, spm.cache,spm.visiable, spm.link, spm.status, spm.component, spm.create_by "createBy", spm.update_by "updateBy", spm.create_time "createTime", spm.update_time "updateTime", spm.deleted from tr_user_role tur left join tr_permission_role_menu tprm on tur.role_id = tprm.role_id left join sys_permission_menu spm on spm.id = tprm.menu_id where tur.user_id = #{userId} and spm.deleted = 0 and spm.status = 1 order by spm.sort

select sr.id, sr.name, sr.code, sr.description, sr.sort, sr.status, sr.create_by, sr.update_by, sr.create_time, sr.update_time from tr_user_role tur left join sys_role sr on sr.id = tur.role_id where sr.status = 1 and sr.deleted = 0 and tur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sr.api_permission FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN tr_user_role tur on tur.user_id = su.id INNER JOIN sys_role sr on sr.id = tur.role_id WHERE su.`status` = 1 AND su.deleted = 0 AND sr.deleted = 0 and sr.`status` = 1 and su.id = #{userId}
